question: You recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home, you found you had left some important papers at the hotel. Write a letter to the manager of the hotel. In your letter.•	Say where you think you left the papers•	Explain why they are so important•	Tell the manager what you want him /her to do
text: My name is Tom Andrew and I am writing this letter to inform you that I had left some important papers at your hotel last week . I attended an international computer application conference and stayed two days in your hotel from 1st to 3rd October 2021.

As I remembered , my room number was BA204 which was located  next to the restroom and I kept my documents inside the locker of that room . The locker secret code was 'BA2018' and you can see one white envelope in it.

Those documents and papers are crucial for my business because my client information and agreement contracts were included in those documents. I could not run my business without having those documents and it will be impacted for my business image as well.
Therefore , I would like to request you to post those documents via some express deliveries as soon as possible and I am willing to pay service charges for that .
I hope you could help me with my request and I am looking forward to hearing from you soon .
